ã€Dong Hwa 2023 Classic Seriesã€‘Romantic and Transcendental â€“ Maestro Leonard Slatkin, and NTSO

Presented by the College of Arts and the Department of Music at National Dong Hwa University, we are delighted to bring you a mesmerizing musical event featuring the internationally acclaimed American conductor, Leonard Slatkin, alongside the prestigious National Taiwan Symphony Orchestra. Leonard Slatkin, an illustrious figure in the music world, has been honored with a staggering six Grammy Awards and has received thirty-five nominations. He currently serves as the Music Director Laureate of the Detroit Symphony Orchestra (DSO), Directeur Musical Honoraire of the Orchestre National de Lyon (ONL).

This extraordinary concert will showcase a captivating repertoire, including Beethoven's "Leonore Overture No. 3," Barber's "Adagio for Strings," FaurÃ©'s "Pelleas et Melisande Suite," and Tchaikovsky's  Symphony No. 5.

Join us for this extraordinary evening as these distinguished artists come together on the stage, illuminating Hualien with their brilliance. Prepare for an enchanting experience that will undoubtedly be worth every moment!

ã€Venueã€‘Concert Hall, College of the Arts, NDHU

Barber: Adagio for Strings, Op. 11
FaurÃ©: Pelleas et Melisande Suite, Op. 80
Tchaikovsky: Symphony No. 5 in E minor, Op. 64
